forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning fog, then cloudy in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with some morning fog. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 40F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
